title: #loveyourbody
content: With the rise of mainstream body positivity, I thought we had finally found a cure for body hatred, insecurity, anxiety, obsession, and dysmorphia! Suffering from body image issues myself, I was beyond excited. But here we are over a decade later, and body image issues are more widespread and dangerous than ever.
author: Jessi Kneeland

title: #simpElle
content: I'm a UK fitness professional and entrepreneur who loves to cycle, sweat and run whilst keep it simpElle is your online fitness studio, fav smoothie bar and weekly health magazine all rolled into one.
author: Elle
